description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows Win32 kernel subsystem (CVE-2024-30086):

1. Download and apply the update package(s) related to KB5039211, KB5039212, or KB5039213 from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure that your system is running a supported version of Windows 10 or Windows 11 as listed below to be eligible for the updates.
3. Restart your system after the installation to apply the changes effectively.

**Details**:
- This update mitigates the use after free vulnerabilities that could potentially allow attackers to escalate privileges on the affected systems.
- For manual installation, download the update packages from the following links:
   - [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
   - [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
   - [KB5039213](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039213)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running a supported version of Windows:
   - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems (build 10.0.19043.4529 or 10.0.22000.3019)
   - Windows 11 Versions 23H2, 22H2, or 21H2 (builds mentioned above).
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
